articles.title: Nations League: 'Deflating end to a flat night as Northern Ireland open with defeat' - BBC
articles.description: It was not the big night at Windsor Park that NI manager Ian Baraclough was looking for as his side lose 1-0 to Greece in their Nations League opener.
articles.content:
Northern Ireland players show their disappointment after the home defeat by Greece
